description: '''Jason Mark Everman''' (born October 16, 1967) is an American musician and soldier who played guitar with [[Nirvana (band)|Nirvana]] and [[Mind Funk]], and bass in [[Soundgarden]] and [[OLD (band)|OLD]]. He later served tours in both Iraq and Afghanistan with the [[United States Army|U.S. Army]] as an [[75th Ranger Regiment|Army Ranger]] and [[Special Forces (United States Army)|Green Beret]]. As of May 2017, Everman plays the guitar in a military veteran band called Silence & Light.
